paramInformation.label: Colour Channels
paramInformation.description: Set number of channels of LED load - single colour, CCT or RGBW

paramInformation.label: Stage Mode
paramInformation.description: Set stage mode for lighting changes

paramInformation.label: Stage Mode Speed
paramInformation.description: Set speed of changes in stage mode

paramInformation.label: Stage Mode Execution Time
paramInformation.description: Set execution time for stage mode

paramInformation.label: Set External Switch Function
paramInformation.description: Enable / disable external switch for inclusion / exclusion
